hero_description: FarmLink is the all-in-one platform empowering farmers, retailers, and local markets with AI-driven insights for a more efficient and fair agricultural ecosystem.
features_description: Our powerful AI tools and transparent marketplace provide everything you need to thrive.
feature_priceAdvisor_description: Leverage AI to get fair price recommendations for your produce based on quality and real-time market data.
feature_marketData_description: Access up-to-the-minute market prices and trends to make informed selling and purchasing decisions.
feature_supplyChain_description: Our AI analyzes supply and demand to recommend the most efficient distribution strategies to minimize waste.
feature_personalizedDeals_description: Retailers receive AI-powered recommendations for the best deals based on their purchasing history.
feature_directConnections_description: A transparent marketplace that directly connects farmers with retailers and local markets, fostering community.
feature_aiAssistants_description: Get instant answers to your questions with our platform-wide FAQ bot and specialized Agri-Assistant for farmers.
aiShowcase_description: FarmLink integrates cutting-edge AI to provide instant support and expert advice. Whether you're a farmer needing crop advice or a new user exploring the platform, our AI assistants are here to help.
aiShowcase_agriAssist_description: Get expert answers to your farming questions, from pest control to market trends.
aiShowcase_faqBot_description: Have a question about a feature? Our FAQ bot provides instant answers.
howItWorks_description: Joining our network is simple and quick.
howItWorks_step1_description: Choose your portal and register as a Farmer, Retailer, or Market Manager.
howItWorks_step2_description: Access powerful tools tailored to your role, from listing produce to analyzing data.
howItWorks_step3_description: Connect with partners, make sales, place orders, and grow your business.
testimonial1_quote: FarmLink has revolutionized how I sell my produce. The AI price advisor helps me get the best price every time.
testimonial2_quote: Finding high-quality, local produce has never been easier. The recommended deals save me time and money.
testimonial3_quote: The Agri-Assistant chatbot is incredible. It's like having a farming expert in my pocket 24/7. I get instant advice on everything.
contact_description: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
portals_description: Select the portal that matches your role to log in or create an account.
portal_farmer_description: Manage your produce, track earnings, and connect with markets.
portal_retailer_description: Browse produce, place orders, and discover new local suppliers.
portal_market_description: Oversee market operations, participation, and logistics.
portal_admin_description: System administration, user management, and analytics.
faqBot_initialMessage: Hello! How can I help you learn about FarmLink today?
agriAssist_initialMessage: Hello! Your Agricultural Expert is Here, 24/7. Ask me about your crops.
contactForm_description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contactForm_success_description: Thank you for your feedback. We'll get back to you soon.
loginPage_farmer_description: Join our network of local farmers, manage your produce, and reach more buyers.
loginForm_farmer_description: Access your dashboard to manage your produce and earnings.
loginPage_admin_description: Oversee the entire platform, manage users, and ensure everything runs smoothly.
loginPage_market_description: Manage operations, track farmer participation, and streamline logistics.
loginForm_market_description: Access your dashboard to oversee market operations.
loginPage_retailer_description: Discover the freshest local produce, connect with farmers, and place orders with ease.
loginForm_retailer_description: Access your dashboard to browse produce and place orders.
loginForm_error_invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
registerPage_admin_description: Create an account to oversee the entire platform, manage users, and ensure everything runs smoothly.
registrationForm_admin_description: Create an account to manage the FarmLink platform.
registerPage_farmer_description: Join our network of local farmers, manage your produce, and reach more buyers.
registrationForm_farmer_description: Create an account to manage your produce and earnings.
registerPage_market_description: Manage operations, track farmer participation, and streamline logistics.
registrationForm_market_description: Create an account to oversee market operations and logistics.
registerPage_retailer_description: Discover the freshest local produce, connect with farmers, and place orders with ease.
registrationForm_retailer_description: Create an account to browse produce and place orders.
registrationForm_error_emailInUse: This email is already registered. Please login instead.
farmerDashboard_description: Welcome back! Here's an overview of your farming activities.
retailerDashboard_description: Welcome! Find the freshest produce from local farmers.
marketDashboard_description: Welcome! Here's an overview of your market's performance.
adminDashboard_description: Welcome, Admin. Here's a summary of the platform's status.
